name: Among Us 3D (Siskos)
description:
This is a 3D variation of the viral game Among Us.

 You are the impostor, and your goal is to kill everyone as fast as you can. Based on your time, you receive a rank.  Can you become an epic gamer??

The code, animations, level design, map design (in 3D), kill mechanics, sound effects, and gameplay are 100% original. 

I do not own the copyrights to the name and character design. 

This project is (obviously) inspired by Dani
